alert.note: Alert for Chester; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 6:52PM CDT until May 15 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Henderson County in west Tennessee... Eastern Madison County in west Tennessee... North central Chester County in west Tennessee... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 652 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jackson, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Henderson, Jacks Creek, Mifflin, Blue Goose, Claybrook, Beech Bluff, Huron, Russell Crossroads, Palestine, Gilmore, Five Points, Maple Grove, Middle Fork, East Union, White Fern, Madison Hall and Pinson Mounds State Archaeological Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
